channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Biden needs to push through promised student-loan relief before Trump returns to White House, powerful Democrat warns
item.description: The Biden administration needs to move quickly to cancel the student loans of borrowers who were already promised relief before President-elect Donald Trump takes office or risk having this White House‚Äôs student-loan agenda undermined, the lawmaker said

item.title: Amazon to invest another $4 billion in Anthropic, OpenAI's biggest rival
item.description: Amazon on Friday announced it would invest an additional $4 billion in Anthropic, the artificial intelligence startup founded by ex-OpenAI research executives.

item.title: Trump hush money sentencing delayed indefinitely
item.description: A New York judge indefinitely postponed President-elect Donald Trump's sentencing in his criminal hush money case.

item.title: Nvidia nearly doubles revenue on strong AI demand
item.description: Nvidia reported earnings after the bell. Here are the results.

item.title: Amazon to invest another $4 billion in Anthropic, OpenAI's biggest rival
item.description: Amazon on Friday announced it would invest an additional $4 billion in Anthropic, the artificial intelligence startup founded by ex-OpenAI research executives.

item.title: Economy gets boost after election on hopes of lower interest rates and pro-business Trump presidency, survey finds
item.description: The economy sped up in November and kept the U.S. on track for another strong quarter of growth, fueled by optimism about falling interest rates and the prospect of a pro-business Trump administration, a new survey showed.

item.title: Trump might name Kevin Warsh as Treasury chief then Fed chair later, report says
item.description: A former Fed governor himself, Warsh would move over to the central bank after current Chair Jerome Powell's term expires.

item.title: Apple and Google could face a competition probe over their huge mobile ecosystems in the UK
item.description: The U.K. Competition and Markets Authority's independent inquiry group recommended the watchdog investigates Apple and Google's activities in mobile ecosystems.

item.title: This REIT could get a boost from a box-office rebound at AMC
item.description: Movie-theater chain and original meme stock AMC expects a box-office boost from a slate of major releases in 2025.

item.title: Why the U.S. is growing less food
item.description: Fruit production is down nearly 36% in 2024 from 2003, while vegetable production is down 6.3%, according to the U.S. Department of Agriculture.

item.title: Germany's 'debt brake' rule helped collapse its government ‚Äî and it could be about to change
item.description: Fiscal and economic policy differences have been blamed for the German government collapsing, but what role did the country's debt brake play?

item.title: Uber may use tech from Chinese autonomous-driving company Pony AI in the U.S.: report
item.description: PonyAI ups the size of its IPO ahead of its U.S. stock-market debut with Uber as a potential investor.

item.title: AI systems could 'turn against humans': Tech pioneer Yoshua Bengio warns of artificial intelligence risks
item.description: There is a "fringe" who might be happy to see humanity replaced by machines according to tech pioneer Yoshua Bengio.

item.title: U.S. embassy in London reopens after suspicious 'hoax' item found
item.description: British police said on Friday that a suspicious package left outside the U.S. embassy in London, which was blown up in a controlled explosion, was a hoax device, according to its initial indications.
